Reviews.Title: Good Idea - Needs Work
Reviews.Author: Shawn
Reviews.Content: The idea to have a stand-alone box camera that can record to SD card / USB is great.  The support to get things working correctly is BAD.  The operation manual states the camera can record to USB Hard Drive - it worked for awhile then stopped working.  Tech support said it does not record to Hard Drive and "they will update the manual soon."I planned to have this camera record high quality video almost constantly and that may have been out of the scope of it's ability.  You may have better luck than I did, but I'd try something else first.Pro's:Good lens, video and jpg quality.Several optionsAlarm input and outputlow cost
